About Me

I'm a second-year Economics & Computer Science student who loves building things with code. I enjoy data, web dev, and the occasional burger 🍔.

Projects

📄 DocuLift

Reduced 2 weeks of data entry into 2 hours using OCR and automation (Dash, PIL, Pytesseract).

🔍 ScrapedIn

Automated search and sorting tool using Selenium and BeautifulSoup. Like Google Search but smarter.

♻️ De-Duping

Data cleaning dashboard that reduces mailing costs and waste. Built with Dash & Pandas.
